comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: Adguard block the countdown timer for sonixgvn.net
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard Browser Extension ### AdGuard version 5.0.128 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc. ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox, Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://sonixgvn.net/dark/?aHR0cHM6Ly9yaW5rdS5tZS9scmlubkxL ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. Hi So, I want to open the [URL](https://sonixgvn.net/the-idolmaster-million-movement-of-stardom-road-03-hypernova/) and click the blue box provided. But, it seems the supposed countdown timer to proceed to the external site is disappeared unless I disabled the extension. What do you think? 2. Screenshots

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

Hi So, I want to open the [URL](https://sonixgvn.net/the-idolmaster-million-movement-of-stardom-road-03-hypernova/) and click the blue box provided. But, it seems the supposed countdown timer to proceed to the external site is disappeared unless I disabled the extension. What do you think? 2. Screenshots

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body: Установите AdGuard Extra как сказано в [первом посте](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/189946#issue-2555677675).

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/184282

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.tripadvisor.de/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.tripadvisor.de%2F) ### Comment > 1. The Google Login leftoverbanner on mobile devices (checked with iPhone) returned, famously known from ticket https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/147383 and ticket https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/161461 and ticket https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/148034 and ticket https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172443 > > The reason why it returned again is because of this ticket https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/187118 and this change: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/990e496d62c4debccb04410d33f0d05e0478ec3e > Unfortunately you replaced it once again by a language specific rule. "Unlock the best" is only valid for the english version `.com` of the page. As you can see on my screenshot is for `.de` the wording "Greifen Sie auf Top-Tipps auf Tripadvisor zu". When I go `.it` it is: "Scopri il meglio di Tripadvisor" and so on... > So when I add back `tripadvisor.*#?##lithium-root > div[style^="bottom:"]:has(> div[class] span > svg[viewBox="0 0 24 24"])` the issue is fixed again. > > 2. issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/184282

issue.title: www.tripadvisor.de

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.tripadvisor.de/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.tripadvisor.de%2F) ### Comment > 1. The Google Login leftoverbanner on mobile devices (checked with iPhone) returned, famously known from ticket https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/147383 and ticket https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/161461 and ticket https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/148034 and ticket https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172443 > > The reason why it returned again is because of this ticket https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/187118 and this change: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/990e496d62c4debccb04410d33f0d05e0478ec3e > Unfortunately you replaced it once again by a language specific rule. "Unlock the best" is only valid for the english version `.com` of the page. As you can see on my screenshot is for `.de` the wording "Greifen Sie auf Top-Tipps auf Tripadvisor zu". When I go `.it` it is: "Scopri il meglio di Tripadvisor" and so on... > So when I add back `tripadvisor.*#?##lithium-root > div[style^="bottom:"]:has(> div[class] span > svg[viewBox="0 0 24 24"])` the issue is fixed again. > > 2. Smartbanner on Top Username: `@Morku` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/kn9cyr1bfaoo4okws8koccco4wg4cwocpeh7pfsoa0.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/s2hyypmdm1w484og8swwg4s4ggc0k4skrd72q7q64g.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Перезагрузил компьютер, чтобы заработал журнал фильтрации.

**Раньше этот сайт работал без каких либо махинаций с правилами фильтрации!**

comment.body:
> @FeST1VaL Странно. Можете проверить, определяются ли Адгарды на тестовой странице? https://adguard.com/test.html
> 
> Интересно было бы взглянуть на скриншоты журналов фильтрации (первого экрана достаточно, если запросов много)
> 
> Какая точно версия браузера?

Видео: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uCG_EwpsZCw

1. Тестовая страница без ВПН почему то вообще не открывается. Но результат с ВПН показал на видео.
2. Почему то вообще пустой сегодня журнал и не обновляется... даже после перезапуска программы...
3. 24.7.6.974 (64-bit) Яндекс браузер.

P.S после написания обращения выше я не мог вообще попасть на следующий день на сайт yummyanime.tv (писало типо сайт разорвал соединение или что то такое), сайт смог открыться когда я добавил в исключения (правила фильтрации) разрешил всякие beacon или же разрешил метрику яндекса... Сегодня открывается без правил вроде как, ну как минимум я удалил (не помню попало ли на видео). 
Так же на видео показал что и в ВК есть реклама, т.е реклама условно на всех сайтах есть.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
> Замок желтый на скрине помощника, а должен быть зелёным
> 
> ![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/375043728-7b1cf59c-16cb-438e-8055-3bf5344be362.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..59XyLTnSWK4gBS6mc9ICT5q9CsPbooFuR3VHm9uX2ss)
> 
> Фильтрация HTTPS включена? Сертификат HTTPS не проблвали переустановить? В Edge повторяется? ВПН, прокси или другие программы для работы с трафиком используете?

1. Я не могу его включить, нажимая на toggle, он перезагружает страницу и все равно остается оранжевым, 
2. https включал, после этого по сути сайт и перестает открываться.
3. Сертификат пробовал переустанавливать.
4. Не использую Edge, 
5. Да конечно, но не на постоянку, пробовал отключать вроде не изменилось нефига, 

- LagoFast (для игры в Throne And Liberty и Discord),
- Browsec (включается только для chatgpt.com), 
- Юбуст (для ютуба)

![2024-10-09_20-06-36](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/2744e0ce-5a98-4574-92c1-66437db6ddee)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Issue URL (Ads) [https://brightpdfpro.com/fileready-blue/?gclid=867975097288504219&utm_source=propellerads&placement_id=6354862_%7Bsubzoneid%7D&utm_campaign=8670256&cost=0.075679](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbrightpdfpro.com%2Ffileready-blue%2F%3Fgclid%3D867975097288504219%26utm_source%3Dpropellerads%26placement_id%3D6354862_%257Bsubzoneid%257D%26utm_campaign%3D8670256%26cost%3D0.075679) ### Comment > This was one of those transparent 'popups' that when you click to download something it takes you to 'the download screen' only it's not the download screen, it's just loaded in another tab and flipped over to it. I'd call that phishing as it's trying to get the unwary to install unwanted and possibly malicious software. On d/l sites I always check the url, so did not catch me out this time. Username: `@the-moog` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/mkt95h56wms800o8gs4c8sg4k8cwsgw3un07pofrti.png?nc=1)

issue.title: blog.livedoor.jp

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/175394) if other issue.
